Description:
Detects potentially suspicious file downloads from file sharing domains using wget.exe

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious File Download From File Sharing Domain Via Wget.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\wget.exe' and original_file_name = 'wget.exe') and (command like '%.githubusercontent.com%' or command like '%anonfiles.com%' or command like '%cdn.discordapp.com%' or command like '%ddns.net%' or command like '%dl.dropboxusercontent.com%' or command like '%ghostbin.co%' or command like '%glitch.me%' or command like '%gofile.io%' or command like '%hastebin.com%' or command like '%mediafire.com%' or command like '%mega.nz%' or command like '%onrender.com%' or command like '%pages.dev%' or command like '%paste.ee%' or command like '%pastebin.com%' or command like '%pastebin.pl%' or command like '%pastetext.net%' or command like '%pixeldrain.com%' or command like '%privatlab.com%' or command like '%privatlab.net%' or command like '%send.exploit.in%' or command like '%sendspace.com%' or command like '%storage.googleapis.com%' or command like '%storjshare.io%' or command like '%supabase.co%' or command like '%temp.sh%' or command like '%transfer.sh%' or command like '%trycloudflare.com%' or command like '%ufile.io%' or command like '%w3spaces.com%' or command like '%workers.dev%') and command like '%http%' and (command rlike '\s-O\s' and command like '%--output-document%') and (command like '%.ps1' or command like '%.ps1'' or command like '%.ps1"' or command like '%.dat' or command like '%.dat'' or command like '%.dat"' or command like '%.msi' or command like '%.msi'' or command like '%.msi"' or command like '%.bat' or command like '%.bat'' or command like '%.bat"' or command like '%.exe' or command like '%.exe'' or command like '%.exe"' or command like '%.vbs' or command like '%.vbs'' or command like '%.vbs"' or command like '%.vbe' or command like '%.vbe'' or command like '%.vbe"' or command like '%.hta' or command like '%.hta'' or command like '%.hta"' or command like '%.dll' or command like '%.dll'' or command like '%.dll"' or command like '%.psm1' or command like '%.psm1'' or command like '%.psm1"'))
